fn.p: Edited by: Charlotte L. Alston, Wellcome Trust Centre for Mitochondrial Research (WT), United Kingdom
Reviewed by: Emanuele Micaglio, IRCCS Policlinico San Donato, Italy; Ye Wang, Sun Yat-Sen University, China; Hezhi Fang, Wenzhou Medical University, China
This article was submitted to Genetics of Common and Rare Diseases, a section of the journal Frontiers in Pediatrics
